record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1919. Sixth row: H. L. Mefford, A. A. Stagg (coach), and C. E .J. Fouche; fifth row: Larry W. Stegeman, R. T. Halladay, B. C. MacDonald, and Mann; fourth row: C. E. McGuire, J. C. Reber, W. D. Pheney, C. C. Jackson, and P. D. Hinkle; third row: R. F. Baker, A. W. Brunhart, E. H. Palmer, and Swenson; second row: J. P. Neff, R. M. Cole, C. G. Higgins (captain), F. M. Elton, and H. O. Crisler; first row: B. E. Hutchinson, L. W. Tatage, P. W. Graham, and H. L. Hanisch.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on heavy, stiff, photo album paper. Attached caption.
